attributes.action: Charge no VAT  and free road tax on all low emission & fuel efficient cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the spiralling high cost of  fuel and  the high cost of road tax on  high emission vehicles  this would be the ideal time for the government to encourage people to buy  low emission and fuel efficient cars  by  charging no VAT on new cars and free road tax on all low emission and fuel efficient cars.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
